attributes.action: Public sector pay rise and MP pay increase
attributes.additional_details:
In this time of austerity where public sector workers are being give pay rises of between 0-1% it is immoral that members of parliament are being awarded a pay increase of 13%. This petition aims to create a fairer pay award for all public sector workers in line with members of parliament who are also public sector workers.
Public sector workers should either receive the same pay award as members of parliament or MPs should receive the same as public sector workers.

rejection.details: There is already an e-petition about this.  Title: MP's pay rises should be same as other Public employees
